data.comment: Samuel Xavier (Ceara) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match is underway at Estadio Castelao.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 2, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Ceara needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Samuel Xavier for the home team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Rafael Sobis hits the bar with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Ceara in Fortaleza.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ceara are pushing forward but Leo Chu's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 13, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Important block from the Ceara defence as Ederson fires in a strike for Corinthians.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Goal! Leo Natel gives Corinthians a 0-1 lead in Fortaleza.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, In Fortaleza Ceara attack through Fernando Sobral. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Ceara's Leo Chu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Anderson Daronco awards Corinthians a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Fernando Sobral for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 23, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Piton Crivellaro for Corinthians who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lucas Piton Crivellaro returns to the field for Corinthians after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
The home team replace Samuel Xavier with Eduardo.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Ceara's Leo Chu has run offside.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Corinthians.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a Ceara throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 31, Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
An unfortunate own goal by Gil makes the score 1-1.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 36, Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Corinthians's area.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderson Daronco waits before resuming play because Lucas Piton Crivellaro for Corinthians is still down.
In the minute 37, It seems as if Lucas Piton Crivellaro is unable to continue. Sidcley replaces him for the away team.
Ceara drives forward and Vinicius Goes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 39, Ceara's Bruno Pacheco misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 40, Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 42, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Fortaleza.
At Estadio Castelao, Corinthians are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 43, Corinthians drive into the zone and Ramiro is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Anderson Daronco awards Ceara a goal kick.
Corinthians's Ederson breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
At Estadio Castelao the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, In Fortaleza Corinthians drive forward through Ederson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Ceara.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Anderson Daronco has blown to start the second-half.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a Ceara throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Corinthians.
Ceara pushes forward through Vinicius Goes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Fabinho of Ceara is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 50, Ceara's Rafael Sobis gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 52, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Leo Chu (Ceara) has received a first yellow card.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 55, Rafael Sobis for Ceara has been booked by Anderson Daronco and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Corinthians close to the penalty box.
Leo Natel (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Corinthians just outside Ceara's area.
In the minute 62, Eduardo (Ceara) has been sent off!
Juan Cazares is replacing Gabriel for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Corinthians's Ederson is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 66, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Coelho (Corinthians) is making a third substitution, with Jo replacing Gustavo Mantuan.
Leandro Carvalho is on a sub for Rafael Sobis for Ceara.
In the minute 67, Ceara have a goal kick.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Castelao with Kelvyn Ramos da Fonseca replacing Leo Chu.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 69, Ceara are coming forward and Leandro Carvalho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Anderson Daronco awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 70, Fernando Sobral of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 72, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Vinicius Goes (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 73, Anderson Daronco awards Corinthians a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 75, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Corinthians's Luan breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Leo Natel with Gustavo Silva. This is the fourth substitution made today by Coelho.
Roni Medeiros de Moura is replacing Ederson for Corinthians at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Corinthians.
Free kick Corinthians.
Luiz Otavio (Ceara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In Fortaleza, Luan of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 80, Attention is being given to Ceara’s Bruno Pacheco and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara's Bruno Pacheco is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in Corinthians.
Anderson Daronco signals a Corinthians throw-in in Ceara's half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 85, Ceara make their fourth substitution with Vinicius Lima replacing Vinicius Goes.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 87, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Ceara.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Ceara.
Gil hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Fortaleza for Corinthians.
Ceara have a goal kick.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Fernando Sobral.
